attributes.action: Block the proposed resolution A/HRC/10/L.. Combating Defamation of Religions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Human Rights Council Resolution
A/HRC/10/L.. Combating Defamation of Religions
A new resolution proposed by Pakistan at the United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC) will define any questioning of Islamic dogmas as a “human rights violation”.
